channel.title: CVE Feed for IBM -- TRIRIGA Application Platform
channel.description: The latest CVEs for IBM -- TRIRIGA Application Platform

item.title: CVE-2020-4868|2024-10-11T14:08:10.928Z -- ibm -- tririga%20application%20platform
item.description: IBM TRIRIGA 3.0, 4.0, and 4.4 could allow a remote attacker to obtain sensitive information when a detailed technical error message is returned in the browser. This information could be used in further attacks against the system. IBM X-Force ID: 190744.
